questions.question_text:
A company wants a service that will discover the company's sensitive data on AWS and identity potential exposure of the data.

Which AWS service will meet these requirements in the LEAST amount of time?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Amazon EventBridge

Amazon EventBridge is a serverless event bus that makes it easy to connect applications together using data from your own applications, SaaS applications, and AWS services. It allows you to create rules that automatically trigger an AWS Lambda function in response to specific events from supported sources, such as an S3 bucket.

In this case, the company could use EventBridge to create a rule that triggers the Lambda function processing data in the S3 bucket once a day at a specific time. The rule could be set to match the S3 bucket's "Put" or "Update" events, and include a schedule expression that defines the specific time of day when the function should be invoked. This would allow the company to easily set up a scheduled daily processing of data in the S3 bucket without having to run or manage any additional infrastructure.
C - Use EventBridge Scheduler in your applications and platforms to provide scheduling services to your customers with reminders, delayed actions, or prompts to continue where they left off.

Selected Answer: C
C. Amazon EventBridge

Selected Answer: C
C is the answer.

questions.question_text:
A company's application stores data in an Amazon S3 bucket. The company has an AWS Lambda function that processes data in the S3 bucket. The company needs to invoke the function once a day at a specific time.

Which AWS service should the company use to meet this requirement?

A company’s application has high customer usage during certain times of the day. The company wants to reduce the number of Amazon EC2 instances that run when application usage is low.

Which AWS service or instance purchasing option should the company use to meet this requirement?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling

"With each Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group, you control when Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling adds instances (referred to as scaling out) or remove instances (referred to as scaling in) from your group. You can scale the size of your group manually by attaching and detaching instances, or you can automate the process through the use of a scaling policy. When you have Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling automatically scale in, you must decide which instances Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling should terminate first. You can configure this through the use of a termination policy. "

https://aws.amazon.com/ec2/autoscaling/faqs/#:~:text=With%20each%20Amazon,a%20termination%20policy.

Selected Answer: D
D is the answer.

Selected Answer: D
D is correct.

questions.question_text:
A company has an application that uses AWS services. During scaling events, the company wants to keep application usage within AWS service quotas.

Which AWS services or tools can report on the quotas so that the company can improve the reliability of the application? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
A. Service Quotas console
B. AWS Trusted Advisor

The Service Quotas console is an AWS service that allows you to view and manage service quotas for your AWS account. It provides a centralized view of all the service quotas for your account across all regions and services, and allows you to request increases in quotas if needed. It also provides you with a detailed view of current usage and the remaining quotas for each service.

AWS Trusted Advisor is a service that analyzes your AWS resources and provides recommendations for optimizing performance, security, and cost. It can provide information on service quotas and usage, and provide recommendations on how to optimize usage to stay within quotas.

AWS Systems Manager, AWS Shield, and AWS Cost Explorer, while useful for other purposes, do not provide information on service quotas.

Selected Answer: AB
A. Service Quotas console Most 
B. AWS Trusted Advisor

Selected Answer: AB
A. Service Quotas console and B. AWS Trusted Advisor are the two AWS services or tools that can report on the quotas so that the company can improve the reliability of the application.

Selected Answer: AB
AB is the answer.

questions.question_text:
A company with many remote global locations needs to upload 100 GB of data daily to its Amazon S3 data lake. The remote locations experience high latency uploading data and need to find a solution to improve performance.

Which AWS service or feature will meet these requirements?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct. 

100GB is not considered a large dataset and should be possible to transfer using AWS Storage Gateway in conjunction with an AWS Direct Connect.

Selected Answer: D
acelerando la transmisión puntual ya que B-AWS Storage Gatewa almacenaría datos en la instalación y la transferencia seria lenta no rápida en un momento dado del día

Selected Answer: D
D. S3 Transfer Acceleration
"Amazon S3 Transfer Acceleration creates fast, easy, and secure transfers of files over long distances between your client and your Amazon S3 bucket. S3 Transfer Acceleration leverages Amazon CloudFront’s globally distributed AWS Edge locations. As data arrives at an AWS Edge Location, data is routed to your Amazon S3 bucket over an optimized network path."

https://aws.amazon.com/s3/faqs/#Amazon_S3_Transfer_Acceleration:~:text=Amazon%20S3%20Transfer%20Acceleration%20creates,over%20an%20optimized%20network%20path.

Selected Answer: D
S3 Transfer Acceleration

Selected Answer: D
S3 Transfer Acceleration is a service that leverages Amazon CloudFront's globally distributed edge locations to accelerate transfers over the public internet to Amazon S3. It improves data transfer speeds over high-latency network connections and enables you to upload data to Amazon S3 up to 300% faster than standard S3 transfers. S3 Transfer Acceleration is particularly useful for remote global locations experiencing high latency, as it reduces the impact of network latency on data transfer performance.

Selected Answer: D
S3 Transfer Acceleration

https://aws.amazon.com/s3/faqs/#Amazon_S3_Transfer_Acceleration

comments.content: AWS Snowball takes 4-6 days to deliver. The requirements is a daily transfer. A is not a viable option.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. AWS Snowball.

AWS Snowball is a data transfer service that helps organizations move large amounts of data into and out of the AWS cloud. Snowball provides a cost-effective, secure, and fast solution for transferring data, especially for remote locations that experience high latency when uploading data to the cloud. With Snowball, the company can transfer up to 100 TB of data per Snowball Edge device, making it a suitable solution for uploading 100 GB of data daily to its S3 data lake.

Selected Answer: D
In my opinion: D
